message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $10,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. I would like to propose a price of $7,500 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While $7,500 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $8,750?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still looking for a price closer to my valuation. I would like to propose a price of $8,250 for the product.
